record.title: ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, JULY 30, 2007
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, JULY 30, 2007 -- (House of Representatives - July 27, 2007)

[Page: H8814]

speaking-unknown-id.title: Ms.
speaking-unknown-id.name: SCHULTZ, WASSERMAN
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 10:30 a.m. on Monday next for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from Florida?
